allow:
Bash(.specify/scripts/bash/create-new-feature.sh --json "subscription. What (Feature Description)

  Add a premium subscription system to SceneFinder that monetizes the app through tiered pricing while maintaining a free tier with ads. The subscription will use native StoreKit 2 and gate advanced features behind
  a paywall, including:

  - Ad-free experience - Remove all Google AdMob banner and interstitial ads
  - Unlimited video analysis - Analyze unlimited videos (free tier limited to 1 video at a time)
  - Share analysis results - Share analysis results and clips with others (premium only)
  - PDF analysis reports - (Planned for future release - not in MVP)

  The implementation will use StoreKit 2 for subscription management with three pricing options:
  - Annual: $36.00/year (marketed as $3.00/month with 86% savings)
  - Weekly: $5.00/week
  - One-Time Purchase: $72.00 (lifetime access)

  The paywall UI will follow a clean design with prominent ""PREMIUM"" branding, feature list highlighting ""No ads. Unlimited analysis. Share results."", and clear pricing cards with a ""Continue"" CTA button.

  Why (Justification & Goals)

  Business Goals:
  1. Immediate monetization - Launch subscription system quickly with core features, adding PDF reports later
  2. Diversify revenue streams - Currently relying solely on AdMob ads, subscriptions create predictable recurring revenue
  3. Accessible pricing - Competitive pricing ($36/year) targets broader consumer market
  4. Lifetime option - One-time purchase at $72 appeals to users who prefer ownership over subscriptions
  5. MVP approach - Ship essential features first, iterate based on user feedback

  User Experience Benefits:
  1. Enhanced privacy - Premium users get an ad-free experience without tracking
  2. Unrestricted analysis - Premium users can analyze entire video libraries without the 1-video limitation
  3. Seamless sharing - Share clips and analysis results directly from the app
  4. Flexible purchasing - Three pricing tiers cater to different user preferences
  5. Clear upgrade path - Free users can test with 1 video, then upgrade for full functionality

  Technical Advantages:
  1. Native Apple solution - StoreKit 2 provides first-party reliability without third-party dependencies
  2. Faster time to market - Focusing on core features (ads, limits, sharing) speeds up MVP launch
  3. Reduced complexity - Postponing PDF reports simplifies initial implementation
  4. Modern async/await API - StoreKit 2 integrates seamlessly with app''s Swift concurrency
  5. Simple feature gates - Video limit and sharing restrictions are straightforward to implement

  Market Positioning:
  1. Try-before-buy - Users can test core functionality with 1 video before purchasing
  2. Consumer-friendly pricing - $36/year competitive with similar utility apps
  3. Clear value proposition - ""Unlimited analysis"" addresses immediate user pain point
  4. Future roadmap - PDF reports as upcoming feature maintains user interest

  Strategic Alignment:
  1. MVP philosophy - Launch with core value proposition, iterate based on usage data
  2. Natural conversion point - 1-video limit creates immediate upgrade trigger
  3. Sustainable growth - Lower prices drive volume while maintaining profitability
  4. Expansion ready - Infrastructure supports adding PDF reports in future update

  Free vs Premium Comparison (MVP):

  | Feature          | Free Tier                 | Premium                    |
  |------------------|---------------------------|----------------------------|
  | Video Analysis   | 1 video at a time         | Unlimited videos           |
  | Batch Processing | Not available             | Unlimited batch processing |
  | Advertisements   | Banner & interstitial ads | Ad-free experience         |
  | Share Results    | ❌ Not available           | ✅ Share clips & analysis   |
  | Event Detection  | ✅ All AI features         | ✅ All AI features          |
  | Clip Generation  | ✅ 10-second clips         | ✅ 10-second clips          |
  | Save to Photos   | ✅ Available               | ✅ Available                |
  | PDF Reports      | ❌ Coming soon             | ❌ Coming soon              |")
